firstBlock.description: The FHZ 25K 102" Hotshot Flatdeck is built for heavy-duty tasks, featuring a 25,000 lbs GVWR, durable 12" I-Beam frame, and ample deck options up to 44'. With DOT-approved LED lighting, dual oil-bath axles, and versatile pintle hitch, it delivers unmatched performance and safety for every haul.

buttons.text: BUILD TO WORK HARD

secondBlock.title: BUILT TO WORK HARD
secondBlock.subtitle: HEAVY-DUTY DESIGN FOR ANY JOB
secondBlock.description: The FHZ 25K 102" Hotshot Flatdeck combines robust construction with practical features to handle any task. With a 25,000 lbs GVWR, bridged 12" I-Beam frame, and dual oil-bath axles, this trailer is ready for heavy loads. The 102" deck width and lengths up to 44' ensure ample space for cargo, while powder-coated finishes and Tecniq LED lighting ensure durability and visibility. Whether hauling equipment or supplies, this trailer offers the performance and reliability you need.

secondBlock.title: VERSATILITY MEETS STRENGTH
secondBlock.subtitle: TAILOR-MADE OPTIONS FOR EVERY HAUL
secondBlock.description: The FHZ 25K 102" Hotshot Flatdeck delivers customizable solutions for your toughest jobs. Choose from deck lengths ranging from 20' to 44' and add features like dovetail ramps or Blackwood rubber-infused lumber. A 12" I-Beam frame and axles ensure stability and strength, while reflective tape and LED lighting enhance safety. With a military-grade finish and a 3-year frame warranty, it’s built to last.

secondBlock.title: ENGINEERED FOR SAFETY
secondBlock.subtitle: PEACE OF MIND ON EVERY HAUL
secondBlock.description: The FHZ 25K 102" Hotshot Flatdeck prioritizes safety and durability. Equipped with 3/8" Grade 70 safety chains, DOT-compliant Tecniq LED lighting, and a sturdy pintle hitch coupler, this trailer ensures secure transport. Dual oil-bath axles with a 6-year warranty provide confidence for long hauls. The heavy-duty ramps and optional disc brakes add flexibility and stopping power. Built for performance, this trailer is your trusted partner on the road.

It features a 102" wide deck, 36" deck height, and a 24' hydraulic tilt deck for effortless loading. Built with a 12" I-Beam frame, it ensures strength and durability for demanding tasks.

secondBlock.title: HEAVY-DUTY CONSTRUCTION
secondBlock.subtitle: Built for durability and strength
secondBlock.description: The FTS 15.2K Split Tilt Flatdeck features a 12" I-Beam frame and diamond mesh storage, ensuring long-lasting performance. With a GVWR of 15,200 lbs and 7k axles, this trailer is built to handle tough jobs with ease and reliability.

secondBlock.title: ADVANCED SAFETY FEATURES

firstBlock.description: The FFH 25K 102" Full Tilt Flatdeck is a durable gooseneck trailer designed for heavy-duty tasks. With a 25,000 lbs GVWR, full-tilt deck, and premium features like a 12" I-Beam frame, hydraulic lift system, and military-grade finish options, it combines strength and functionality to handle the toughest jobs effortlessly.

secondBlock.title: BUILT TO LAST
secondBlock.subtitle: DESIGNED FOR DEMANDING TASKS
secondBlock.description: The FFH 25K 102" Full Tilt Flatdeck sets a new standard for heavy-duty trailers. Engineered with a 12" bridged I-Beam frame, dual 10k axles, and a power-up/power-down hydraulic lift system, it offers unmatched durability and convenience. Choose from deck lengths up to 40' and vibrant finishes like Military Green or True Red. Experience the reliability of a 6-year axle warranty and a 3-year frame warranty. Whether hauling heavy machinery or large loads, this trailer delivers performance and peace of mind.

secondBlock.title: POWERFUL HYDRAULICS
secondBlock.subtitle: EFFORTLESS OPERATION
secondBlock.description: The FFH 25K 102" Full Tilt Flatdeck boasts a 2-button hydraulic system with a KTI 12V pump, making heavy lifting effortless. Designed with a tilt angle of 14° to 19°, it accommodates various load types efficiently. The sturdy 2" x 6" tubular bed frame ensures longevity, while LED lighting and grade-70 safety chains enhance safety. Whether you’re working on rugged terrains or highways, this trailer is ready to perform.

secondBlock.title: CUSTOMIZE YOUR TRAILER
secondBlock.subtitle: MEET YOUR UNIQUE NEEDS
secondBlock.description: With the FFH 25K 102" Full Tilt Flatdeck, customization is key. Select deck lengths from 24' to 40' and upgrade with options like Blackwood Pro decking or aluminum wheels. Add a wireless 6-button remote for enhanced control or equip it with Winchmax winches for extra hauling power. Paired with a powder-coated finish in bold colors like Flame Orange or Midnight Black, this trailer stands out while delivering exceptional functionality. Tailor it to your specifications and tackle your toughest jobs with confidence.

firstBlock.description: The FFH 25.9K 102" Full Tilt Flatdeck Gooseneck Trailer combines durability and innovation with its 12" I-beam frame, hydraulic tilt deck, and Mega Lockable Toolbox. Choose from a range of deck lengths (24'-40') and colors. Rated for 25,900 lbs GVWR, it’s perfect for heavy-duty hauling with style and reliability.

buttons.text: OPTIMIZED FOR HEAVY-DUTY HAULING
ULTIMATE RELIABILITY FOR YOUR WORKLOAD

secondBlock.title: OPTIMIZED FOR HEAVY-DUTY HAULING
secondBlock.subtitle: BUILT TO LAST, DESIGNED TO IMPRESS
secondBlock.description: With a GVWR of 25,900 lbs and hydraulic tilt functionality, the FFH 25.9K 102" Full Tilt Flatdeck excels in handling demanding loads. Its 12" engineered I-beam frame and slide-in side steps ensure durability and safety. Available in stunning colors like Flame Orange or Navy Blue, this trailer turns heads while getting the job done.

secondBlock.title: UNLEASH THE POWER OF TILT
secondBlock.subtitle: EFFORTLESS LOADING, MAXIMUM EFFICIENCY
secondBlock.description: The FFH 25.9K 102" Gooseneck Trailer features a full-tilt hydraulic deck for easy and secure loading. With lengths from 24' to 40', dual 12k axles, and a wireless remote system, it offers unparalleled convenience and reliability. Customize it with optional upgrades like Blackwood decks or Ratchet Slide Tracks for a tailored solution.

secondBlock.title: ULTIMATE RELIABILITY FOR YOUR WORKLOAD
secondBlock.subtitle: STRENGTH MEETS INNOVATION
secondBlock.description: Equipped with DOT-approved LED lighting, a 12" bridged I-beam frame, and Interstate deep-cycle batteries, the FFH 25.9K ensures peak performance on every haul. Its powder-coated finish resists wear, while safety chains and reflective tape provide peace of mind. Available with multiple upgrades, this trailer is your heavy-duty partner built to endure.

name: FFH 30K 102" GN FULL TILT FLATDECK
notes: The images may not match with the product specs.

firstBlock.description: Experience unmatched strength and versatility with the FFH 30K 102" Full Tilt Flatdeck Trailer. Featuring a 30,000 lbs GVWR, dual 16k axles, and a fully tilting deck, this trailer is built for heavy-duty performance. Designed with premium materials and innovative features like a Mega Lockable Toolbox and hydraulic lifting system, it’s the ultimate solution for your toughest hauling needs.

buttons.text: MAXIMUM STRENGTH FOR HEAVY LOADS

secondBlock.title: MAXIMUM STRENGTH FOR HEAVY LOADS
secondBlock.subtitle: Unleash the Power of 30K GVWR
secondBlock.description: The FFH 30K 102" Full Tilt Flatdeck is engineered for the toughest jobs. With a robust 12" I-Beam frame, dual 16k axles, and Hutchens suspension, this trailer ensures unparalleled durability. The fully tilting deck offers convenience, while DOT-approved LED lights provide safety. Make every haul efficient and reliable—choose strength, choose FFH 30K.

secondBlock.title: INNOVATIVE DESIGN FOR MAXIMUM EFFICIENCY
secondBlock.subtitle: Tilt, Load, and Go—Effortlessly
secondBlock.description: Simplify your work with the FFH Full Tilt Flatdeck Trailer. Its hydraulic power tilt system, adjustable GN coupler, and slide-in side steps on both sides make loading and unloading a breeze. Available in multiple deck lengths (24'–40') and colors, this trailer is as customizable as it is efficient. Tackle your next job with precision and ease.

secondBlock.title: BUILT TO ENDURE
secondBlock.subtitle: Durable Features for Long-Term Performance
secondBlock.description: The FFH 30K trailer is built to last with powder-coated finishes, pine lumber flooring, and weather-resistant wiring harnesses. Its Bridged 12" I-Beam frame handles heavy-duty tasks, while the six-year axle warranty ensures peace of mind. Take on rugged terrains and heavy loads confidently—this trailer is your reliable workhorse for years to come.

firstBlock.description: The FFHSS 25K 102" Full Tilt Flatdeck Gooseneck Trailer combines robust engineering and convenience. With a 25,000 lbs GVWR, hydraulic tilt deck, and premium powdercoat finish in vibrant colors, it's built for demanding jobs. Features include dual 10k axles, diamond mesh storage, and a spare tire mount. Choose lengths from 24' to 40'.

buttons.text: UNLEASH YOUR HAULING POWER

secondBlock.title: UNLEASH YOUR HAULING POWER
secondBlock.subtitle: 25,000 lbs Capacity Meets Unmatched Durability
secondBlock.description: The FFHSS 25K 102" Full Tilt Flatdeck is the ultimate solution for heavy-duty hauling. Equipped with a bridged 12" I-beam frame and super single 10k axles, this trailer is designed for reliability and efficiency. Enjoy features like hydraulic tilt functionality, 14°-19° deck angles, and military-grade finishes. Customize your deck length from 24' to 40'!

secondBlock.title: BUILT TO OUTLAST
secondBlock.subtitle: Engineered for Demanding Jobs
secondBlock.description: Featuring a Neckboss 12" I-Beam, powdercoat finishes, and Tecniq LED lighting, the FFHSS 25K 102" Full Tilt Flatdeck excels in both functionality and style. With a 38" deck height, pine lumber flooring, and 25,000 lbs distributed lift capacity, it handles the toughest loads while ensuring durability. Choose from vibrant colors to match your style!

secondBlock.title: CUSTOMIZATION MEETS PERFORMANCE
secondBlock.subtitle: Tailored for Every Job
secondBlock.description: The FFHSS 25K 102" Full Tilt Flatdeck offers flexibility and efficiency. With hydraulic jacks, a wireless remote control, and options like Blackwood flooring, you can optimize this trailer for your needs. Select deck lengths from 24' to 40' and choose from 12 stunning colors. Its rugged design is perfect for professionals seeking dependability.

firstBlock.description: The FFHSS 25.9K 102" Full Tilt Flatdeck Gooseneck Trailer combines robust engineering and convenience. With a 25,900 lbs GVWR, hydraulic tilt deck, and premium powdercoat finish in vibrant colors, it's built for demanding jobs. Features include dual 10k axles, diamond mesh storage, and a spare tire mount. Choose lengths from 24' to 40'.

buttons.text: UNLEASH YOUR HAULING POWER

secondBlock.title: UNLEASH YOUR HAULING POWER
secondBlock.subtitle: 25,900 lbs Capacity Meets Unmatched Durability
secondBlock.description: The FFHSS 25.9K 102" Full Tilt Flatdeck is the ultimate solution for heavy-duty hauling. Equipped with a bridged 12" I-beam frame and super single 10k axles, this trailer is designed for reliability and efficiency. Enjoy features like hydraulic tilt functionality, 14°-19° deck angles, and military-grade finishes. Customize your deck length from 24' to 40'!

secondBlock.title: BUILT TO OUTLAST
secondBlock.subtitle: Engineered for Demanding Jobs
secondBlock.description: Featuring a Neckboss 12" I-Beam, powdercoat finishes, and Tecniq LED lighting, the FFHSS 25.9K 102" Full Tilt Flatdeck excels in both functionality and style. With a 38" deck height, pine lumber flooring, and 25,000 lbs distributed lift capacity, it handles the toughest loads while ensuring durability. Choose from vibrant colors to match your style!

With a 25,000 lbs GVWR, it features a full tilt bed, dual 10k axles, and hydraulic lifting system for easy loading. Available in 24' and 40' lengths, this trailer is built for durability and versatility.

buttons.text: FULL TILT TRAILER SOLUTION

secondBlock.title: HEAVY-DUTY TILT DECK TRAILER
secondBlock.subtitle: For Serious Hauling Needs
secondBlock.description: The CFT 25K 102" GN FULL TILT FLATDECK is perfect for those needing strength and reliability. With a 25,000 lbs GVWR, it offers a full tilt deck for easy loading and unloading. Equipped with a 2-button hydraulic lift system, this trailer ensures smooth operations for heavy equipment transportation.

secondBlock.title: VERSATILE AND DURABLE TRAILER
secondBlock.subtitle: Perfect For Heavy Loads
secondBlock.description: With a 25,000 lbs GVWR and dual 10k axles, the CFT 25K 102" GN FULL TILT FLATDECK is designed for versatile hauling. The full tilt deck ensures easy loading, while the 12V hydraulic system provides reliable lift and smooth operation. Available in 24’ and 40’ lengths for flexibility in different projects.

secondBlock.title: FULL TILT TRAILER SOLUTION
secondBlock.subtitle: Built For Heavy Duty Work
secondBlock.description: The CFT 25K 102" GN FULL TILT FLATDECK is engineered for tough hauling tasks. Equipped with a full tilt bed and a hydraulic lift system, it simplifies the loading and unloading of heavy equipment. The trailer is available in multiple lengths and features durable components, making it a reliable choice for demanding jobs.

name: CFT 25.9K 102" GN FULL TILT CONTAINER FLATDECK

firstBlock.description: The CFT 25.9K 102" is a heavy-duty gooseneck flatdeck trailer designed for durability and performance. Featuring a full-tilt deck, 12” I-beam frame, and hydraulic lift system, it offers a 25,900 lbs GVWR. Equipped with LED lighting, a lockable toolbox, and dual axles, it ensures reliability for hauling heavy loads.

buttons.text: PREMIUM FEATURES AND SAFETY

secondBlock.title: HEAVY-DUTY TRAILER DESIGN
secondBlock.subtitle: Built for Maximum Durability
secondBlock.description: The CFT 25.9K 102" is constructed with a 12” bridged I-beam frame and 102” deck width. Its heavy-duty steel guides, reinforced flooring, and robust hydraulic system provide strength and stability. Perfect for demanding jobs, it offers a 25,900 lbs GVWR, ensuring reliability in tough conditions.

secondBlock.title: FULL-TILT DECK FUNCTIONALITY
secondBlock.subtitle: Effortless Loading and Unloading
secondBlock.description: This trailer’s full-tilt deck allows for smooth and efficient loading. The hydraulic-powered tilt system features a 14°–19° tilt range, depending on deck length. Combined with a strong single-push cylinder hoist, it ensures seamless operation, making it ideal for transporting heavy equipment or machinery.

secondBlock.title: PREMIUM FEATURES AND SAFETY
secondBlock.subtitle: Designed for Secure Hauling
secondBlock.description: Equipped with a Mega Lockable Toolbox, LED lighting, and 3M DOT reflective tape, this trailer prioritizes safety and convenience. Dual oil-bath axles, electric brakes, and a 3/8” Grade 70 safety chain enhance stability and security, making it a top choice for professional hauling needs.

name: CFT 30K 102" GN FULL TILT CONTAINER FLATDECK

firstBlock.description: The CFT 30K 102" is a heavy-duty gooseneck full-tilt flatbed trailer designed for maximum performance. With a 30,000 lbs GVWR, dual 16k axles, and a hydraulic tilt system, it ensures smooth loading. Featuring a robust 12" I-beam frame, pine lumber flooring, and multiple color options, it’s built for durability and reliability.

secondBlock.title: ULTIMATE HEAVY-DUTY TRAILER
secondBlock.subtitle: Built for Maximum Strength
secondBlock.description: The CFT 30K 102" features a 12" I-beam frame and a full-tilt deck for easy loading. With a GVWR of 30,000 lbs, dual 16k axles, and a hydraulic system, it handles the toughest jobs. Premium powdercoat finishes and a rugged design ensure long-lasting durability for any demanding work environment.

secondBlock.title: POWERFUL HYDRAULIC TILT SYSTEM
secondBlock.subtitle: Smooth and Effortless Loading
secondBlock.description: This full-tilt trailer is equipped with a 2-button hydraulic system, powered by a KTI 12V pump. With a tilt range of 14°-19°, loading heavy equipment is quick and efficient. A durable steel frame and removable steel guides enhance functionality, making it the perfect choice for professional haulers.

secondBlock.title: DESIGNED FOR RELIABILITY
secondBlock.subtitle: Built for Tough Conditions
secondBlock.description: Featuring a 38" deck height, 102" width, and heavy-duty double slipper mechanical suspension, this trailer is made to last. DOT-approved LED lights, an all-weather wiring harness, and an advanced braking system ensure safety and compliance. A Mega Lockable Toolbox and storage options add convenience for professional operations.

buttons.text: DESIGNED FOR TOUGH JOBS

secondBlock.title: DESIGNED FOR TOUGH JOBS
secondBlock.subtitle: Heavy-Duty Performance, Exceptional Reliability
secondBlock.description: The FYZ 25K 102" Hydraulic Dovetail Flatdeck Trailer features a 25,000 lbs GVWR and a 12' hydraulic dovetail for seamless loading. Built with a Bridged 12" I-Beam frame and high-tensile steel, it handles the toughest jobs with ease. Enjoy superior convenience with a wireless remote, diamond mesh toolbox, and industry-leading warranties.

secondBlock.title: CUSTOMIZABLE LENGTHS, PREMIUM BUILD
secondBlock.subtitle: Tailored Solutions for Every Haul
secondBlock.description: Choose from 30' to 44' lengths to fit your needs. The FYZ 25K 102" Gooseneck Trailer offers a 34" deck height, 102" width, and pine lumber flooring for durability. Enhanced with slide-in side steps and a hydraulic dovetail, this trailer is built to optimize your hauling experience.

secondBlock.title: BUILT TO LAST
secondBlock.subtitle: Quality, Durability, and Style
secondBlock.description: With its powder-coated finish and color options like Military Green and Midnight Black, the FYZ 25K 102" Trailer combines style with strength. buttons.text: ULTIMATE STRENGTH FOR HEAVY-DUTY JOBS

Its pine lumber floor and powder-coated finish ensure superior durability, making it the ideal choice for commercial and industrial tasks. Haul smarter with unmatched strength and reliability.

From industrial to agricultural use, this trailer adapts to your needs with unmatched ease and versatility.

With a GVWR of 25,900 lbs, a spacious 102" deck width, and lengths ranging from 30' to 44', this gooseneck trailer is built for heavy-duty tasks. Featuring a hydraulic dovetail, wireless remote control, and robust I-beam construction, it's the ultimate tool for your hauling needs.

buttons.text: THE TRAILER THAT DOES MORE

secondBlock.title: MAXIMIZE HAULING EFFICIENCY

Enjoy convenient features like a mega lockable toolbox, wireless remote control, and versatile lengths from 30' to 44'. Rugged, reliable, and ready to work—this is the trailer you need.

firstBlock.description: The HYZ 40K 102" Hydraulic Dovetail Flatdeck combines rugged durability with advanced features like a 12' hydraulic dovetail, Mega Lockable Toolbox, and Hutchens Suspension. With a 40,000 lbs GVWR and lengths up to 44', it’s built for heavy-duty performance.

buttons.text: MAXIMIZE YOUR HAULING CAPACITY

secondBlock.title: MAXIMIZE YOUR HAULING CAPACITY
secondBlock.subtitle: BUILT FOR TOUGH JOBS AND RELIABILITY
secondBlock.description: The HYZ 40K 102" Hydraulic Dovetail Flatdeck is engineered for the toughest jobs. Featuring a 40,000 lbs GVWR, dual 16k axles, and a 12' dovetail with 10,000 lbs hauling capacity, this trailer is ready for any challenge. Its powder-coated finish and versatile color options ensure durability and style.

secondBlock.title: PREMIUM FEATURES, UNMATCHED PERFORMANCE
secondBlock.subtitle: DESIGNED FOR EFFICIENCY AND VERSATILITY
secondBlock.description: This gooseneck trailer offers advanced features, including a Neckboss 14" I-Beam, Tuff Wireless Remote, and 12' hydraulic dovetail for smooth operations. With a deck width of 102" and lengths up to 44', it’s perfect for heavy-duty tasks, ensuring safety and efficiency every time.

secondBlock.title: BUILT TO LAST
secondBlock.subtitle: EXCEPTIONAL ENGINEERING FOR DEMANDING TASKS
secondBlock.description: The HYZ 40K is crafted with a Bridged 14" I-Beam frame, Hutchens suspension, and premium radial tires for ultimate stability. Its 6-year axle warranty and 3-year frame warranty reflect its exceptional durability. Choose from 12 bold colors to customize your trailer to your style.
